name: Peripherals
description:
Formless blobs, lidded eyes on stocky bodies, dodging dangers around every corner!

Rail gun in hand you will enter a world inhabited only by enemies.

In those shaded halls however, you might find a new ally, one you might find you have known for longer than you think.

Controls

WASD to move, R to reload, ESC to quit… You’d think.

Made by
Asbjørn, Daniel, Eigil & Holger
